dmca.title: Copyright violations on sites hosted by you.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 3:58:24 p.m.
(GMT-6) on October 27, 2006.

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Oggbashan [mailto:oggbashan@yahoo.co.uk] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 9:17 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Copyright violations on sites hosted by you.
Subject: Copyright violations on sites hosted by you.


Some of my copyright stories have been stolen from Literotica.com that
has my permission to post them, and have been posted as follows:

http://www.starznaked.com has May Pole, copyright April 2005, and Earthy
Fifties, copyright April 2005.

http://beingfucked.com has Sister Nun, copyright October 2004.

http://sexvids.org has Headshot, copyright 4 July 2004.

http://pornvids.org links to the above sites/stories.

In each case my story has been stolen COMPLETE WITH MY COPYRIGHT NOTICE
AS A HEADER. This is a blatant abuse of copyright.

Please will you ensure that my stories, and any others of mine that have
been posted on these sites, are removed forthwith.

My ownership of these stories is stated at the start of each file.

oggbashan
